title: Cubus
author: Cubus
created_time: November 14, 2022, 12:32:17 PMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 10:16:57 AM by Cubus
content: Welcome to the first official WePad Airdrop Campaign!High transparency, technical advancement and responsible approach — this is what distinguishes WePad from other IDO launchpads. As a part of the WeWay ecosystem, our platform provides users with access to the best startups in the industry, eliminating the need to conduct any check-ups.Allocation from WePad is another strong point. Now, with WePad, you receive one of the biggest allocations on the market. And it is guaranteed!                           Airdrop Rules:• Reward token: WeWay ($WWY)• Campaign budget: $4000 in $WWY• Campaign dates: 14.11 - 11.12• Rewards will be distributed weekly. First distribution will be on 25.11 and week by week afterwards.• Only those who have filled the registration form are eligible for the Airdrop. • We leave ourselves the right to remove you from campaign if we think that you are cheating or spamming.• We can refuse to let you participate in our campaign for the reasons of suspicious activity.• You cannot unfollow our social networks while the airdrop program is active and 2 weeks afterwards.• Leave a Proof of Authentication comment in this Bitcointalk thread. Length: 4 weeks Telegram Join Campaign:• Join our official Telegram group (https://t.me/wepad_en)• Write a message in chat • Refer at least 2 friends in our group• Reward: $1 in $WWY + $0.2 for every referred friend above 2• Fill the form right there with your personal information • Check out your status in this spreadsheet Fill this form to register: https://forms.gle/fbyjbEqn3yuhDhSH6  Twitter Follow Campaign:• Follow our official Twitter page (https://twitter.com/WePad_IDO)• Retweet the last post on the WePad Twitter page• Tag 3 friends in a comment under that post • Reward: $0.25 in $WWY• Fill the form right there with your personal information Fill this form to register: https://forms.gle/y1xYMptuQMVurPu1AAnd do not miss our AMA session today on 15 of November! There you can ask all your questions regarding our project.Spreadsheet to check your status: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/194WhCPBeTMZCHbHyK1gXrkCOB0mYVvpML1XY__QT_QQ/edit?usp=sharing
